evs.metric.parameters
Class ForecastTypeParameter

java.lang.Object
  evs.metric.parameters.ForecastTypeParameter
All Implemented Interfaces:
MetricParameter
public class ForecastTypeParameter
extends java.lang.Object
implements MetricParameter

Records the types of forecasts to be used in a verification study. Specify multiple forecast types for use in skill calculations.

Version:
4.0
Author:
evs@hydrosolved.com

Field Summary

          Indicator for a reference forecast for use in a skill calculation.

static int RESAMPLED_FORECAST
          Identifier for a forecast type used to compute sampling uncertainty, such as a bootstrap realization.

          Indicator for sample climatology as the reference forecast for use in a skill calculation.

static int SKILL
          Identifier for a result based on a skill calculation.
